summary: This mod adds a cute tattoo which represents a word. The Tattoo will be in Chinese Language but it looks really cool and all :). I Suggest you check this out.
descriptionHtml:
Installation Instructions

- Extract The Zip
- Find you player race 
( Example i use Oriental so i have to go \"data\\textures\\actors\\character\\Oriental\\Female\")
- Make sure you backup your files by creating a new folder called backup, copy paste everything there
- Now choose your word.
- Go in that folder Copy the .DDS. (IMPORTANT .PNG will not work and is only there for editing!)
- Copy and replace the femalebody_1 .dds file
- Done, Enjoy :)

There are 10 Words
Angel
Death
Devil
Dragonborn
Eternal
Guardian
Legendary
Mortal
Seeker

I also take suggestions

I run this on CBBE v3, idk about the others.
author: UnkownRb
